etymology.description: 大(大) (dà, "big") + 丿(丿) (piě, "left-falling stroke") = large area on the lower back -> buttocks
etymology.interpretation: The character combines 大(大) (dà, "big") and 丿(丿) (piě, "left-falling stroke") to depict a large surface, which is associated with the buttocks. This reflects the large area the character represents on the human body.
